fintechForMerchantsSummary: We provide payment solutions for merchants to accept payments from customers. We offer payment gateway, payment link, QR code payment, and more.
fintechForBanksSummary: We provide high-tech products and services for banks and payment institutions. We offer core banking, payment gateway, mobile banking, and more.
company_description: The roots of EticSoft date from the early 2000s. All the journey started with a young coding enthusiast who started to share open-source payment software with communities. When the software started to get huge attention from the open-source users all around the world, it had been impossible to handle thousands of requests from hundreds of users for a young student. As we know, it was not possible to create extraordinary software like "SanalPosPro" without that young-amateur spirit too.
founder_info: Mahmut GÜLERCE, the founder of EticSoft had to establish a company while he was a student. As any company should have procedures, structures, rules, and targets, EticSoft has all plus the amateur spirit.
company_info: EticSoft is a remarkable fintech development company located within the premises of Akdeniz University, Turkey. EticSoft is composed of an efficient team with hands-on experience of 18 years.
facilities_text: We have achieved several prestigious projects, including "SanalPosPro", and end-to-end products offering comprehensive solutions as a Bank or a PF/PSP company. EticSoft is the leader in the payment gateway software market in Turkey based on the number of registered merchants and transactions. Also, Eticsoft provides software help to the partner companies.
policy_text: EticSoft follows its written and published documents as policies, guides, terms, and procedures to be used as references in our actions and responsibilities in our operations. Those written documents aim to sustain our service/product quality and all have been published as publicly by the principle of transparency.
support_panel_text: If you need customer support you may get an earlier reply if use our support panel instead.
visit_requirements: * Appointment is required before the visit.
security_note: * Security check procedures may apply before accessing RD fields.
office_address:
Akdeniz University Campus
TEKNOKENT ArGe-1 Build F1 5/C,
Antalya – TURKEY
mottoDescription: We provide innovative fintech solutions for businesses and financial institutions to help them grow and succeed in the digital age.
fastSupportDesc: We provide fast support to our customers. We have a dedicated support team to help you with your problems.
experienceDesc: We have been in the fintech industry for 20 years. We have worked with many banks, payment institutions, and merchants.
fastDevelopmentDesc: We provide fast development for our customers. We have a dedicated development team to develop new features.
customerSatisfactionDesc: We care about customer satisfaction. We always listen to our customers and improve our products and services.
bankSolutionsDesc: We provide high-tech products and services for banks and payment institutions. We offer core banking, payment gateway, mobile banking, and more.
merchantSolutionsDesc: We provide payment solutions for merchants to accept payments from customers. We offer payment gateway, payment link, QR code payment, and more.
bpcsDesc: BPCS is a fully customizable banking architecture with cutting-edge fintech components for bank/payment institutions.
pfcsDesc: PFCS is a ready-to-launch payment institution/facilitator system that's the "all" a PI needs to be started its own operation.
fraudDesc: Our hybrid (artificial intelligence & rule-based ) Fraud Protection solution runs as a "Fintech as a Service" fully compatible with a bank/PI system.
cooperationTitle: Cooperation Programs for Banks & Payment Institutions
cooperationDesc: Dozens of banks and payment institutions have developed cooperations on our products/projects to reach out to the market.
mobileAppsDesc: We're developing the best mobile applications for banking/payment institutions for merchant side mobile payments.
consultingDesc: We're ready to share our 20 years of hands-on experience on FinTech to achieve an efficient, sustainable, and secure journey.
sanalposDesc: Sanalpos Pro is a payment gateway solution for Opensource E-commerce platforms (WooCommerce, Opencart, Prestashop). Use your all gateways in one place.
author: Author

companyServices: E-commerce, OpenSource Software, Customer Support, R&D
partners_text: We extend our gratitude to our valued partners who have joined forces with us on our journey in the fintech sector. The prestigious banks and payment institutions we collaborate with have seized the opportunity to provide better service to their customers through our innovative fintech solutions. Thanks to these strong partnerships, we continue to add value to the industry by pioneering groundbreaking projects in financial technology. The trust-based relationships we have built with each of our partners form an integral part of our success story.
